The thesis was awesome, the preprint was awesome, the per-reviewed article is thus awesome. It was nice to follow this project!
Microtubules control nuclear shape and gene expression during early stages of hematopoietic differentiation | The EMBO Journal https://t.co/RoiBP9c0NG
text.1: Ever wondered how can we transfer our experience to our kids (literally)?Blood circulating factor can transmit the history of psychological trauma to offspring. An insightful collaborative work with Nicola Zamboni @IMSB_ETH @ETH_DBIOL @ETH_en https://t.co/5LK8rxGlan https://t.co/A9nSsaehg9
